Ok so lets start with the juice bar.  Excellent, everything a juice bar should be. Great selection great prices great tasting juices.  The yoga classes are next level, the instructors are amazing and so accommodating to anyones yoga needs, from beginner to pro.
Visited everyday on my trip to Miami! Vibe was warm and welcoming as was Joanne. I love the Green Warrior 1 and Heart Opener Smoothie! Check out their class specials as well.

Great food and juices. Super clean. I ordered to go and order was ready and perfectly packed when I arrived. Almost no contact. Will definitely be ordering again. Thanks for being open and giving is this healthy option.

Awesome place!! Got an unreal açai bowl here, accommodated to dietary restrictions for me, big bowl as well..good portion, fresh ingredients, very yummy. The people were so friendly as well! Highly recommend!!
Very convenient location, friendly staff, lot of class options and hours!!! Lovely bar and deliciCious smoothies!!

Good vibes at this Excellent yoga studio in Miami Beach. I have practiced yoga for many years and really enjoy how Max's classes are not cookie cutter classes. She guided us into some postures I would not have thought possible and with ease. Relax your face! :)
The experience has been incredible! the staff is super  friendly and the environment is too peaceful. I just love nobe yoga!
Nobe has wonderful vibe inside and all the teachers are very good.
Nobe yoga and Juice is a perfect Studio. A Variety of classes and one is  certain to walk out with a smile on your face and an Ocean Breeze. Healing juices and Salads too! Hope to see you at Nobe!🌸
Clean, beautiful, spiritual and welcoming! Every class I have taken has been great! I have been physically and spiritually inspired. Thank you!
This studio is absolutely wonderful ! Suitable for all levels, all you have to decide is do I need yin or yang right now , or both ! 😍 So happy I found this place !
Very friendly and Johan is awesome!  My first time doing yoga and I've seen much improvement in my flexibility and strength thanks to Nobe Yoga.  They also have awesome food.
Love love love this place. Instantly warm and welcoming the minute you walk in to the minute you walk out. The classes are absolutely amazing

I LOVE this place and all of the class offerings.  The classes are all amazing and I’ve been able to try new things too, like Kundalini.  Very nice owner & staff.  The Green Peace smoothie is also fantastic.
My experience on Nobe Yoga is amazing, I love to go to yin yoga class, I feel that is perfect for me as a beginner. Thank you to give us the opportunity to feel better every day😊👏

Nobe Yoga is an amazing place to practice yoga. The vibe encourages you to be more excited. It offers different types of practice and has a variety of schedules. The people are very friendly and welcoming. I would recommend this place to those looking for a space to practice in Miami Beach.

A true yoga community. Excellent teachers in a wide variety of styles with a very nice emphasis on chanting and sound baths. The juices and food is an added bonus. I like that you can order your juice to be ready for the end of your class.
Great place to get healthy snacks and juices. Very good yoga classes
I’ve enjoyed every class I’ve been to. There’s a warm and friendly vibe in the studio. Teachers are very approachable and knowledgeable. I highly recommend trying it out ❤️🙏🏼✨
Nobe Yoga is awesome !
I love Nobe studio! First, the teachers are all super nice, friendly and professional. Second, the studio is always clean and well maintained. In addition you can get a fresh juice or smoothie.
Really great studio with a wide variety of interesting classes. The teachers are excellent, and the studio is well maintained and super clean. I highly recommend stopping by if you live in the area!
Unbelievable experience at Nobe. Great vibes, good people and exceptional yoga classes!
One of the best

Such a warm, welcoming studio with amazing instructors. Wide variety of different types of yoga. Great place, easy parking & a juice bar inside!!

My experience  every time i come In to this studio is always top of the line yoga. From every instructor being so knowledgable from Yin to Kundalini to teacher trainings im always happy to Come In to this studio knowing i will leave with the right info and right practice for my body and soul .
Awesome Studio ! Lovely vibe, highly recommended.

Best vinyasa yoga teachers and classes at north Miami Beach! Individual attention, Cozy rooms, wonderful from desk team, delicious juice bar. 💕🕉

I just started doing yoga at Nobe Yoga and I love it. So far all the classes I have attended are lead by great teachers! And they offer different type of  yogas which is awesome too. Everyone there is so friendly and welcoming. Must try it!

Perfect start of the day - beach yoga at 7 am every Tuesday and Saturday. I do recommend this yoga classes. If you are tourist like me and you need 2-4 times during your vacation sign up at their website.
Amazing studio with small classes and caring instructors. If you want to perfect your practice come here. They have classes for all types and very welcoming.

Great atmosphere, yoga room and super friendly staff with an awesome juice and health food bar. One of my favourite reasons I go to Miami! They have various yoga classes and great teachers so you'll definitely find something for yourself. Even offer a morning beach yoga class or bootcamp☆
Really nice place! Max is one of the best yoga teacher I met!

Nobe is one of the best yoga studios in Miami. The teachers are amazing, and the studio is gorgeous with a fresh juice bar and healthy foods. They have yoga classes for all levels including flow, yin and restorative. Fantastic yoga, fantastic teachers!
Vinyasa Flow with Ana is my fave! Highly recommend it. I walk in super stressed and leave relaxed & focused!

The bathrooms are clean, the air quality is nice. I would like more natural light when practicing. The studio is organized and well run.
The classes are wonderful,  and everybody is really charming..:-) Danielle

This is my first month, I purchased the $99 unlimited pass for first time locals. This studio has amazing yoga instructors. Each different offering wonderful experiences in mind, soul and body. All team members are very kind and hospitable.  I love that after class I can enjoy a healthy juice or meal. Thank you for all you do!
The teachers and classes are always great, everyone is very friendly. Love coming here

Just visiting Miami, and I am very happy about my practice today. The instructor was very good- helpful and knowledgeable. Staff is very nice, and the juice bar was good!
Great breakfast place, great service. Loved it
Loving Nobe Yoga, great & challenging classes (lots to choose from), and good vibes.
I have been doing yoga at Nobe for one month now and feel amazing! I just finished my 15th class. Love the atmosphere and the classes are fabulous!

Amazing staff and teachers that really focus on your form and well being. I would recommend Nobe Yoga to anyone who is looking for a challenge yet a place where they feel comfortable! So glad I joined and look forward to taking more yoga classes!

This is a wonderful studio with amazing teachers. They have a range of classes, power yoga, restorative, and kundalini. The teachers are skilled and are hands on. Clean and bright, a fantastic yoga experience! The Acai bowls at their juice spot are the best on north beach!

Great teachers! Great classes! Energetic environment! Body feels great after! Good food! Promotes healthy living.
Nobe yoga is great. The teachers and the atmosphere are wonderful . A beautiful studio. You will enjoy your practice here. Highly recommend.
Great new studio with a great vibe and amazing classes.
Maxine's Power Yoga class is amazing! Somehow I get both a stretch and a workout simultaneously, and I leave feeling amazing every time!

Such a beautiful space with great energy. After two yin classes, I am ready to try the variety of yoga they offer. So happy to have found this gem in my new neighborhood!
Wow!  My first experience and it was wonderful!  Christin was a great Yoga instructor!  And the smoothie was delicious too!
This place is a fantastic addition to the neighborhood. Great variety or classes and knowledgeable, friendly teachers! Love the power yoga with Max and yoga bootcamp with Joann!

I’m really enjoying this wonderful yoga studio. It’s conveniently located down the street from where I live. The classes are taught by skilled yoginis and there’s always a warm atmosphere! The juice bar is pretty great too and on Friday’s they have Happy Hour!

Love the feel of this studio- very calm and serene, beautiful energy! They offer an amazing variety of classes to suit different needs.
Enjoyed my visit to Nobe Yoga during my Vacation in Miami. The teachers are very knowledgeable and caring. Loved my practice and attended a special evening of music and cacao!!!

I just finished my 5th class. I’ve had 5 great instructors. The team here is super friendly and super talented.

This has been the best studio I have ever been to! super positive energy, beautiful space and best Acai bowls in town at Just Juice Me located inside. I took several classes over spring break and my favorite classes were with Radha, Max and Nicola. I highly recommend visiting this place!!

Such a modern cozy place for yoga! Very well designed. All the equipment is brand new. Instructors are super professional. I personally have fallen in love with Yin yoga thanks to this place. Vey convenient schedule. Advanced web-site. Everything is very easy-going. Great job!
Rada Khrisna, Max and Gabriell classes especially wonderful. Feel good and energectic after you visit the studio. Friendly place which they love 🐕 dogs too.

I had the most amazing class with Max. Best power yoga class. Started the class with a relaxation exercise that was exactly what I needed. She adjusted me when needed and walked us through our routine with compassion. I’ll be back tomorrow.

What a welcoming spot on Miami Beach, a true oasis for all levels of practice. Instructors are so knowledgeable and willing to take their time with students. Huge fan of the juice bar inside and parking is pretty easy in the area. Class schedule has a variety of times and levels which is clutch. Yoga with a smile for sure.
Super friendly, great yoga and juice spot conveniently located. All in one!

Great staff, wonderful energy, beautiful facility and the juice bar is a major PLUS! I'm so happy this place popped up near me, it's my saving grace.

I absolutely love nobe yoga! It’s a truley amazing environment; great people, classes and it’s clean which I always appreciate.
Great place!

Such a nice variety of classes and the instructors are all really knowledgeable. Nice people too, feels like a real community! Very welcoming and unpretentious. Super excited about their juice bar also!

Took a class with Nulise and thought she was perfection. Very educational and patient, she made sure to explain everything in great detail and helped us stretch every single muscle. I highly recommend her and will definitely be back. With much gratitude.
I love this beautiful space! Took a class with Gabriel and his adjustments were amazing! This allowed me to deeper into almost every pose. I will definitely be taking his and other classes again!

I went to the Sunday 6:45 PM Candle lit Class with Amber and it was the perfect way to end a busy week. I highly recommend her class. The Studio is brand new and the owners did a great job, its just what North Miami Beach needed.
I absolutely love the vibe! Motivated people ready to motivate you to reach your goals. The yoga instructor was amazing. Great vibe, great energy, must go!
